channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8324238] [macOS] java/awt/Frame/ShapeNotSetSometimes/ShapeNotSetSometimes.java fails with the shape has not been applied msg
item.description:
The following test failed in the JDK23 CI:

item.summary: [macOS] java/awt/Frame/ShapeNotSetSometimes/ShapeNotSetSometimes.java fails with the shape has not been applied msg

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Fix request [11u]

I backport this for parity with 11.0.24-oracle.
No risk, only tests change.
Clean backport.
Test pass. SAP nightly testing passed.

Fix request [17u]

I backport this for parity with 17.0.11-oracle.
No risk, only tests change.
Clean backport.
Test pass. SAP nightly testing passed.

Fix request [21u]

I backport this for parity with 21.0.3-oracle.
No risk, only a test change.
Clean backport.
Test pass. SAP nightly testing passed.

[~vdyakov] Yes, I believe it is the same issue. Looking into it.
is ShapeNotSetSometimes related to JDK-8320113

The fix for the following bug:

JDK-8320113 [macos14] : ShapeNotSetSometimes.java fails intermittently on macOS 14

was integrated in jdk-23+7-428. This test failure
occurred in jdk-23+7-430-tier4 so the fix is present.
